mapper.update:
update PBCRS_REPORT_ENBASINFBSSGMT set INFRECTYPE = #{InfRecType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENTNAME = #{EntName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENTCERTTYPE = #{EntCertType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENTCERTNUM = #{EntCertNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INFSURCCODE = #{InfSurcCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RPTDATE = #{RptDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RPTDATECODE = #{RptDateCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CIMOC = #{Cimoc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUSTOMERTYPE = #{CustomerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ETPSTS = #{EtpSts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORGTYPE = #{OrgType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ReportFlag= #{ReportFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_CODE = #{Cimoc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}-->
where BSSGMTSEQNO = #{BsSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select BSSGMTSEQNO, INFRECTYPE, ENTNAME, ENTCERTTYPE, ENTCERTNUM, INFSURCCODE, RPTDATE, RPTDATECODE, CIMOC, CUSTOMERTYPE, ETPSTS, ORGTYPE,ReportFlag,SOURCESYS from PBCRS_REPORT_ENBASINFBSSGMT where BSSGMTSEQNO = #{BsSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select BSSGMTSEQNO, INFRECTYPE, ENTNAME, ENTCERTTYPE, ENTCERTNUM, INFSURCCODE, RPTDATE, RPTDATECODE, CIMOC, CUSTOMERTYPE, ETPSTS, ORGTYPE,ReportFlag from PBCRS_REPORT_ENBASINFBSSGMT
select count(1) from PBCRS_REPORT_ENBASINFBSSGMT bb where 1=1
mapper.insert: insert into PBCRS_REPORT_ENBASINFBSSGMTM (BSSGMTSEQNO, INFRECTYPE, ENTNAME, ENTCERTTYPE, ENTCERTNUM, INFSURCCODE, RPTDATE, RPTDATECODE, CIMOC, CUSTOMERTYPE, ETPSTS, ORGTYPE, REPORTFLAG, etl_date ) select BSSGMTSEQNO, INFRECTYPE, ENTNAME, ENTCERTTYPE, ENTCERTNUM, INFSURCCODE, to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-MM-dd'), RPTDATECODE, CIMOC, CUSTOMERTYPE, ETPSTS, ORGTYPE, '0', to_date(to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') from PBCRS_REPORT_ENBASINFBSSGMT where bssgmtseqno = #{bssgmtseqno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
